definition: governing body of an autonomous territory
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: The organs of self-government of national autonomous areas shall apply the principle of democratic centralism.
sentences.chinese: 民族自治地方的自治機關實行民主集中制的原則。
